personal.name: Vuchint Sutapalli
personal.title: Full Stack Web Developer
personal.tagline: Crafting digital experiences with modern technologies
personal.bio: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with 3+ years of experience building scalable web applications. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful solutions that provide exceptional user experiences.

projects.title: Realtime Collaborative Drawing Tool â€” Excalidraw-style
projects.description: Realtime collaborative drawing application with synced editing, comments, room-based persistence, PNG/JSON import-export, and scalable monorepo.

projects.title: Turn-Based Real-Time Board Games Platform
projects.description: Multiplayer platform for chess, tic-tac-toe, snakes & ladders with a pluggable game engine architecture and real-time synchronization.

experience.description: Worked across multiple product lines to modernize the learning ecosystem, improve web performance, and deliver reliable platform-wide UX.
bullets: Built React-based Timed Quiz Platform handling 50,000+ monthly assessments with autosave, timers, and auto-evaluation.
Led migration of legacy Backbone.js platform to React improving load time by ~40% and mobile UX while ensuring WCAG accessibility.
Designed and built Student Data Platform using React, Formik and Yup, reducing manual operational workload by 60% and managing regression cycles with QA.

experience.description: Developed tooling and dashboards to automate debugging and real-time anomaly monitoring.
bullets: Developed C++ based log analyzer with rule-based anomaly detection reducing debugging time by 70%.
Built React + Chart.js monitoring dashboard and SMTP-based alert system for real-time escalation of critical events.
